RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::ClientConnect

RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::ClientConnect Class Reference

#include <clientconnect.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Verifies the client connection ability.

It uses xmlPlayerList to check if this client can connect. To test the connection ability of a client, you must call the constructor of this class with the username and the password of the user.

Do not pass the password hashsum here, the constructor need the user's password, not its password hashsum.

To know the response of the connection, call the getResponse() function and test the tClientConnectReturn returned with a switch.

See also:
tClientConnectReturn, xmlPlayerList

Definition at line 55 of file clientconnect.cpp.

RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::tClientConnectReturn RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::ClientConnect::connect ( const char *  user,
const char *  pwd 
)

Try the connection of this user user with the given password.

The order of testing is CCR_INEXISTANT_USER, CCR_EMAIL_NOT_VALIDATED, CCR_BLACKLIST, CCR_WRONG_PWD.

Parameters:
user The account name of the user
pwd The password of the user
Returns:
The connection status
See also:
